reviews.review:
Portal 2 is simply a great and stunning puzzle game. There are some times when you feel like the "tests" you have to do are easy, but other times they are hard and they really make you think.
The graphics are also really good, and the story line has you really interested wanting to know more and more. I 100% reccomend this game to anybody looking for a fun but also challenging game!

神作,官方中文
I solved puzzles with portals.... for the 2nd time

Never have I played a game where I so desperately wanted to hear every single second of perfectly written and voice acted dialogue. This game has the two best villains in gaming, and is certainly beyond criticism in that regard. 

Oh, and the puzzles are fun too.
 
Pros
- Incredibly well written, especially considering the type of game it is
- Puzzles are creative, challenging, and fun, but never too hard.
- PC version has a fun level creator that you can dick around with. 
- Wanna play with friends? There's co-op.
- First game where I was actually nervous to fight a boss in a long time
- Would be worth it for the experience if the puzzles weren't also fantastic

Cons
- You might get stuck, especially on some of the puzzles in the late game
- Not as fun if you haven't seen/played the first game

Ideas/Suggestions
- I can't possibly come up with something that would make this game better.

10/10. Without a doubt one of the best games ever made.

This game is possibly the best game of all time. The fantastic story and brilliant gameplay make such a joy to play and participate in.

A must buy.

Un clásico de Valve y Steam. Juego recomendadísimo para jugadores que busquen tanto una historia sencilla pero bien llevada, los juegos de puzzles y plataformas y especialmente, para quien le guste un buen cooperativo junto a un compañero. Si cumples esos requisitos, compra obligada especialmente si está rebajado.
Es un juego que tiene una maravillosa historia y buena y sencilla forma de jugar. Además su multijugador es muy divertido

10/10

Brilliant! Portal 2 is one the best puzzle games ever and it has gameplay mechanics unlike any other game. 

Its story is one one the best stories and characters in any game. There's a lot of humour and mystery in this one.

The game's length is perfect as it doesn't outstay its welcome, but if you want more you can play multiplayer or check the community generated content.

Portal 2 is one of the best PC games ever and everyone that enjoy games has to check it out.

Portal 2 Şu an'a dek Oynadığım En Yaratıcı Ve Karmaşık Oyunlardan Biri , Oynarken Gerçekten Çok Büyük Bir Haz Alıyorum Çok Az Oynamış Olmama Rağmen Oyunu Çok Sevdim Ancak Bir Yanlış Varki Bazı Bölümlerde Portalı Açabilmeniz İçin Duvarın Beyaz Renkte Olması Gerekiyor Ama Bir Bölümde Bütün Duvarlar Beyaz Renkli Ve Nereye Açabileceğin Belli Olmuyor
Ama Sorun Haricinde Gerisi Mükemmel Yapılmış Evde CS:GO Gibi Sizi Sinir Ve Kanser Edicek Oyunların Yerine Bunu Oynayabilirsiniz,
Buda Kanser Eder Ama En Azından İYi Bir Kanser :)
Arkadaşlarınızla Beraber Oynayınca Gerçekten Eülencesini Görüceksiniz Oyunu Bitirmenizi Tavsiye Ederim Ancak Zor Olduğu İçin Daha Kendim bitiremedim :/
Steam Üzerindeki Sınırlı İyi Oyunlardan Biri Zaten İncelemelerde Görüceğiniz üzere Oyunun %98 Üzerindeki Bir İncelemesi Olumlu Zaten Oyunun İyi Olduğunu İncelemelerinden Görebilirsiniz Arada Sırada ''Tavsiye Etmiyorum'' Yazılarının Görebilirsiniz ancak Bütün Oyunların Bazı Sevmeyenleri Olabilir, Oyunu Size Şiddetle Hatta Ya Severek yada ... Neyse Alın Yani Sizi Seviyorum :D
( Kappa ) LOL :)

[h1] Лучшая гамка	[/h1]

✮ ✮ ✮ ✮ ✮

Бест оф зи бест. Игра столетия. 

Если учесть, что игра в принципе вообще не сложная, то влюбиться из-за этого не получится. Игра же берет атмосферой происходящего. Юмором. Вы вроде как выполняете вполне обычные действия, перемещаетесь из одного испытания в другое, иногда оно дается на реакцию, в некоторых моментах нужно выбирать и действовать четко и быстро. Однако вся эта напряженка с лазерами, разрубающими вас пополам, бурлящей жижой под колоннами, смертоносными турелями сопровождается чертовски искрометным, в некоторых местах даже саркастическим юморком. Каждый герой имеет свой характер, свой стиль шуток или угроз. Это фантастическая работа разработчиков. Данная игра, даже если вы затупок, дарит вам бешенные эмоции. Вы сидите как идиот с идиотской улыбкой на протяжении всей игры. Я считаю, что это достойно для любой игры. Создать интересные головоломки можно, если немного поднапрячься, но сопроводить это все шикарной атмосферой - дорогого стоит! 

Я рекомендую данную игру не только любителям квестов, головоломок и роботов. Просто любой геймер с абсолютно любыми предпочтениями найдет для себя там что-то свое.
Puzzles, physics and lots of goo. What more mayhem can you ask for!
самая крутая игра что я видел :D
Basically, if you like puzzles, this game is for you.

Great story, great fun, great voices, and smooth as butter thanks to the Source Engine. One of the best games I have in my library.

Would I recommend it ? I'd rather ask why you haven't bought it before.

10/10
This game is amazing. The story and characters are so much better than the first game. There is greathumour, more confusing puzzles and lots of stuff trying to kill you.

Beh che dire...è un titolo a dir poco FANTASTICO!
Portal 2 rappresenta una rivoluzione rispetto al suo predecessore, la storia continua sulla stessa linea ma le novità sono tante e si scoprono nel corso dell'avventura...avventura curata in ogni minimo dettaglio: scenari, dialoghi, rompicapo. Tutto davvero perfetto!
i dilemmi che si affrontano nel gioco sono bilanciati: non capita quasi mai di bloccarsi per moltissimo tempo il che potrebbe diventare frustrante, ma non capita nemmeno mai di risolvere la situazione in uno schiocco di dita...insomma tutto bilanciato perfettamente. 
una volta finita l'avventura si ha la possibilità di creare delle proprie stanze e condividerle con la community, e di giocare alle stanze create da altri utenti (anche in co-op, fantastico se si ha un amico che gioca allo stesso titolo): potenzialmente quindi è un gioco che non finisce mai
Penso che sia uno di quei giochi che non si dimenticano.

Voto: 10/10

Portal 2 foi o primeiro jogo que eu comprei quando eu tinha 13 anos, hoje eu tenho 22 anos e muuuita coisa mudou, a maioria ainda bem pra melhor, e esse jogo foi uma delas, amo essa maravilha de video game, acho que ele é a coisa mais perto de ser um jogo perfeito que eu vou jogar.
o ótimo senso de humor misturado com um storytelling fantastico, os puzzles e as mecânicas muito bem pensandas e executadas, o voice acting excelente, é inesquecivel. 
seu único defeito é o fator replay, mas o único mesmo.
realmente eu acho que Portal 2 deve ser o melhor jogo feito pela VALVe...ate agora eu acho, por que Half Life Alyx ta ali e agora eu preciso pegar um Óculos VR e cair dentro pq, no final das contas, a VALVe é a unica em que você pode confiar pra te dar uma experiencia maravilhosa e inesquecivel, mesmo que você morra de velhice esperando eles lançarem algo novo, sempre vale a pena.

The Game is good. I don't know what else to say so here's a recipe for waffles

1 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast 
2 tablespoons warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) 
2 cups all-purpose flour 
1 teaspoon baking powder 
1 teaspoon baking soda 
1 tablespoon white sugar 
1/2 teaspoon salt
3 eggs 
2 cups buttermilk 
2 tablespoons vegetable oil

In a small bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water. Let stand until creamy, about 10 minutes.
In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, sugar and salt. Make a well in center. Add yeast mixture, eggs, buttermilk and vegetable oil; stir until smooth.
Spray preheated waffle iron with non-stick cooking spray. Pour 1/4 cup batter onto hot waffle iron. Cook until golden brown, about 3 minutes. Serve hot.
-allrecipes

I definitely would recommend it if asked.

非常新颖的一款游戏，就算没玩过传送门1也可以直接从2开始玩。这可以说是一款FPS游戏，但却杀不了人，确切的说这应该是一个FPS解谜游戏，哈哈，玩完后会发现根本停不下来，本人直接两天时间通关。绝对的神作。

fun
sooooooo gooooood!

As the local midwife would say, you win some, you lose some.
Story, characters and setting are far better explored than the first game, and even beyond the standard expository dialogues, there's a bit of background storytelling to be had. At the beginning, the humor comes across pretty forced, but it picks up pretty soon and by the end you'll be smiling at almost every exchange.

The additions towards the puzzle system are quite cool, overall there's more variety and a lot more puzzles to be had.
They do tend to get pixel-hunty in the midsection of the game tho, and it can be frustrating to be stuck in a room for a while because you oversaw something. Difficulty curve is alright too.

They gave this game lots of love when they made it, and altogether it is superb. Really, really enjoyed it.

[h1] Pros: [/h1]
+Beautiful level design
+Smooth gameplay (Even for older computers)
+Fun solving puzzles
+Interesting story
+Pretty graphics
+Longer than the first game
+Awesome characters with great humor
+Creative soundtracks
+Co-op
+Workshop maps

[h1] Cons: [/h1]
-Puzzles are easier then Portal 1
-Not too much replay value after beating campaign a couple of times.

Genial!

У Portal 2 есть огромный, страшный, безобразный изъян. Её мало. 14 часов одиночной кампании и «коопа» пролетают мгновенно, словно летний сон. Рука так и тянется к «New Game», чтобы пройти игру снова, наслаждаясь умными головоломками и острыми, как лезвие бритвы, репликами героев. Но в одну реку не войти дважды — чертова память цепко держит каждую задачку. Остается слушать божественную арию из финального ролика и уповать на скорую амнезию. Или выход DLC — смотря что произойдет быстрее.
Super Spiel! Nur zu empfelen!

¿Un analisis?
Un gran juego, bastante mas largo que el primero y que introduce muchas nuevas mecánicas de juego. No solo esta la campaña individual y cooperativa (que ya es bastante) sino que luego puedes jugar los mapas creados por la comunidad. Si el juego se te hace corto es porque no le has sacado el máximo partido.
当年还是玩得盗版的橙盒，自从玩了橙盒，就成了V社脑残粉。Portal一代就非常令人惊艳，Portal2其实惊艳程度没有那么高，但是加上丰富的合作体验和社区，依然是PC上的顶级作品.

Probably among the best games I have ever played. Excellent, funny, and witty story with great characters and voice acting. The environments are creative, the gameplay is challenging but doable, and the music is great. Comes with full co-op and single player modes, along with an integrated editor to build and play your own test chambers. Cannot recommend this game enough. 10/10
